campaign.story:
This project was inspired by, motivated by, and is now part of Zine Quest - the Kickstarter RPG magazine initiative. According to the rules, our project is in black and white and will be a saddle-stitched A5 booklet.
I wanted to make the easiest-to-play TTRPG ever. It had to have some mechanics, it had to inspire awesome adventures, and... it had to have zero math, no dice, and just be a blast to play regardless of the player's TTRPG experience. (No easy feat let me tell you).

I also needed a setting that was both cinematic and action-packed... Bounty Hunters in space.

So I proudly present to you for your backing: Bounty Hunter - a cinematic, slick, and easy-to-play TTRPG.

"The PCs are Bounty Hunters taking on jobs, hunting down bounties, claiming the rewards and living large in a galaxy full of wonders and chaos. "
Retro-styled, easy to use, and printed on recycled paper
If you've ever wanted to run a cool game set in space with super simple rules -and you wanted to run it now - this is the game system for you.
In this 32 page A5 rulebook we've packed in:
All the rules needed to run the game
  Character creation and Backstory Generator
  96 Bounty Hunter random names generator
  Starship Combat
  5 sample starships
  5 sample NPCs
  Epic bounty hunter equipment
   The rules are designed in such a way that this Bounty Hunter TTRPG can be played with ZERO BOUNTY HUNTERS and is also an awesome Sci-Fi TTRPG system. Wanna run Galaxy Journey? Galaxy Conflicts? Warsun Universia? A large open space that expands for a long way? It's all here. 

This is the color version of the booklet. Many folks seem to prefer the color option, so here it is! This is still subject to change if we get funded.
The rules are simple. So simple in fact the system was originally called "Yes/No" as that was the only mechanic. Can you fly a ship? Yes or no? Do you dodge the mouth of that massive Keel Wyrm as it tries to eat you and your ship? Yes or no? I wanted nothing to stand in the way of a great adventure and an awesome gaming session.
After playtesting my rules set, refining it, and bashing it about, Bounty Hunter is the end result and ticks all the boxes: No math, no dice, all fun.
A Carbithian captain could not outrun QW1CK-K1LL.
Character Creation is a breeze. Seven unique alien races, dozens of career paths, histories, and momentous life changing events shape your character. In fact, once character creation is done - you have a full blown character backstory ready for the GM to use and abuse. That's how complete this system is.
Character creation is fast and easily guides your characters backstory as you make it.
New players will enjoy the fact that within 10 minutes they are up and running with a cool character chasing bounties, fighting monsters and flying spaceships.
You end up with a cool Bounty Hunter and a great backstory. Your GM ends up with several solid plot hooks and a PC with a backstory!
There are a few more steps than just these five presented here. I wanted players to experience the power of a good backstory, without becoming overwhelmed and either not creating anything, or writing a novel. The system helps you write a concise yet solid narrative of just who your character is and how they came to be a Bounty Hunter.
The Combat system is - like everything else in the game - straight forward and quick. Space combat - ship versus ship - is super simple yet verbally dramatic. Each character sheet, monster, and starship comes with all the rules pertaining to how they work on their sheets. You don't need to remember or learn anything. It is all right there!

"Cinematic TTRPG" was another title that we considered; which seemed apt since the very essence of this game is about vivid descriptions, awesome actions and kick-ass heroes... or anti-heroes!
Combat is all about the drama, the fun, and all the PCs having a role aboard their own starships
 The settings booklet will feature a galactic map and dozens of planets, peoples, places, and ships for you to use in your game! 
I'll make a starmap like this one (one of my other campaign settings) and will fill it with fun things for your PCs to explore and do!
We have unlocked our third stretch goal! A second booklet will now ship with the main booklet. The second booklet will feature an introductory adventure for Bounty Hunters TTRPG! 

The main booklet will now include a variety of extra starships for your bounty hunters to command, attack, and board! We will also include additional Monsters and NPCs, primed and ready for use! 

Next goal: My First Bounty - a Bounty hunter introductory Adventure written by me for you to use! 
A small job! A small job!
 I'd also write up an adventure that would be added to the booklet. Finally, The Campaign Setting would feature a map of the galaxy and a write up of all the major aliens and places needed for a full campaign.
I've designed rule systems for 5th Edition, rule systems for dozens of homebrew systems for decades, and rule systems for fun. None of them are so intuitive and dramatic as this rules set. My partner - a total TTRPG noobie (literally 1 game of 5th ed under his belt) - challenged me to make a system without math or dice (random number generator). I initially said it couldn't be done.

Then I realized... it could be. With a little inspiration, several dozen hours of playtesting basic mechanics, a couple hundred hours of tweaks, and bingo: Bounty Hunter the TTRPG was born.

I love sci-fi as a setting, and I've always been frustrated with traditional TTRPGs that force great roleplaying off the table in favor of random outcomes. This system is not my first attempt to marry these two concepts together, but this is the best one I've created thus far and I'm proud to play this game and explore this space, and I hope that you and your players will be equally entertained. Let your story begin...

"In a cantina at the edge of space sits a nervous Fulkathian engineer. Sweat pools on his brow. He knows he is being hunted. And hunted by the best.
You walk into that cantina, you know the target is here because you are the best. You are Bounty Hunter."
Keel Wyrms can get big... really big... Oh and they fly through space. Did I mention that?
So why do we need to kickstart? We want to bring in a professional designer for the layout, editor to make sure it makes sense, and have more artwork made to flesh this puppy out. Join us and together we can rule... I mean collect ALL the bounties!
We are proud to be part of Zine Quest 3
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Very few risks exist. The rules have been written, the game tested. The print run is easy and delivery is based on the limited weight of the project. 

We're an established company that have run successful kickstarters before. We know what needs to be done and we are willing to do it!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Reusability and recyclability
The paper version is printed on recycled paper.

support.title: Bounty: A lowly clerk
support.descp:
When you bring the clerk in for justice, you'll be rewarded with a digital copy of the Bounty Hunters TTRPG rulebook and any unlocked rewards.

1 x PDF of the Bounty Hunters TTRPG

support.title: Bounty: A senior Captain
support.descp:
The captain is bad news and needs to be brought down. This will get you all the documents you need to play the game.
INCLUDES:
1 x PDF of the Bounty Hunters TTRPG
1 x Printed, saddle-stitched paperback of the TTRPG
Name a Bounty Hunter for the roster in the book

support.title: Bounty: Admiral of the Fleet
support.descp:
The Admiral is heavily guarded. Take him down and get rewarded with a full color, gloss printed version of the rules.

1 x PDF of the Bounty Hunters TTRPG
1x Saddle-stitched color gloss paperback of the TTRPG
Name a Bounty Hunter for the roster in the book
Have your name listed in the book as a backer

updates.update_content:
Hello everyone!

I have excellent news. This morning, with the generous help of a good friend of mine, we loaded 300 odd books into the car and dropped them off with the post office. Over the course of the next few days the post office will process these (they couldn't tell me how long, but they seem to be able to handle around 30 - 40 orders in an hour or so, so by Wednesday next week I'm hoping the books will go out.

Hello all,
Well after a week of stupid confusion - totally on my behalf - I am finally ready to start shipping the books out. This is going to be a long process as sadly the local post office can only process so many orders at once. I've tried to find a way around it, but it just seems this is the way. 
Nonetheless they are shipping out and I'll give you a heads up as soon as the last one leaves so you should get an idea of when yours will arrive. 
Happy hunting,

updates.update_userinfo: Posting is about to start - Bounty Hunter TTRPG
updates.update_content:
Hello all,
A quick update. The first batch of books will go out this Monday, the 7th of June. I'm not sure how long the post office will take to resolve the shipping, estimates range from a few days for locally in the UK to 4 weeks internationally. 
I wish I could post them all on Monday, but sending out 300 individual packages takes time. I'll update you as soon as the last batch has shipping out, which I'm hoping to do by the 18th of June.

updates.update_userinfo: All printed and Ready to go!
updates.update_content:
Hello everyone,
This should sum up everything you need to know...

Hello everyone!
PDF
With this update you should also get an email with a link to the updated PDF. There are four changes in the PDF - all of them spelling. However, this is the final PDF version, thank you for your patience.

updates.update_userinfo: Upgrade from a PDF only to a print, or from black and white to color before Friday!
updates.update_content:
Hey everyone!
Just a final reminder that you can upgrade from a PDF to a color print copy or from a black and white copy to a color copy. 
 PDF to Color Upgrade 
Or

Hey all,
Due to popular request we have made it possible for folks to order a physical copy of the book, if you only backed at the PDF level. 
Follow this link to make your upgrade. 
 Click here to upgrade

Hello everyone,

I hope you had a great weekend! We spotted a few gremlins that crept into the PDF and will be updating them as soon as possible. 
PRINTING

updates.update_userinfo: It is over - the bounty is captured!
updates.update_content:
Hello everyone,
It is done! I have the final PDFs on my drive. I'll be sharing them out with you via an email sent out with this update. What a journey this has been. Then on Monday I shall be sending the print-master version to the printers. How long it will take to get the printed copies back I am unsure, but they said it should be 2 weeks. 
After that I hit the post-office with 300 packages.

campaign.story:
Darkest Dungeon is a critically acclaimed video game developed by Red Hook Studios and released in January 2016. After having sold more that 4 million copies of the base game and over 8 million copies including DLCs, the time has come for Darkest Dungeon to move from the screens to your table. Welcome to Darkest Dungeon: The Board Game! 
Click to see the update!
Click to see the detailed update!

Click to see the gallery!
Click to see the gallery!
Click to see the gallery!
Click to see the gallery!
Click to see the gallery!
Please note minis come unpainted.
Darkest Dungeon: The Board Game is a fully cooperative dungeon crawler game in which players take on the role of adventurers. Although brave and determined, adventurers are only human! They are prone to the madness and pain the twisted dwellers of the dungeons will inflict upon them. Death can occur, but is not the worst fate: heroes can be driven mad and beyond help!
Please note minis come unpainted.
The game is played in campaigns of 11 missions. To reach the Darkest Dungeon itself, players will undertake 3 missions per threat level and vanquish the boss. Then, they will be strong enough to face the horrors of the Darkest Dungeon! They may emerge victorious... if they dispatch the source of evil that plagues the land.
Please note minis come unpainted.
For each hero, select 3 skills out of 7 before heading into your mission (and level the heroes up to gain access to more skills). In each room, pick the most suitable stance to best resolve the conflict! Then, on each turn, a player chooses two of the available actions of moving, interacting with the environment, changing their stance or using a skill (if eligible for their current stance). Triumph over encounters, resist rampant madness and emerge victorious before throwing yourself into another battle. Between missions, spend your time in the hamlet, visiting various buildings to find relief from the physical and mental trauma you’ve just endured. Restore the hamlet to its former glory and it will reward you and help you to fulfill the ultimate goal.
RPG-like heroes  – A robust level up system with a ton of customization for unique playable characters.
Stressful Affliction System – Heroes' personalities are paramount! Contend with paranoia, abusiveness, fear, irrationality, and a host of gameplay-meaningful quirks.
Town meta-game – Help your Hamlet growth, and tend to your heroes’ wounds, both corporeal and cerebral.
Loot! Gold, consumable supplies, and mystical trinkets.
Classic roguelike features  transferred to your table, including permadeath & procedural dungeons.
High Replay-ability – One tile, infinite dungeons.
Tough tactical choices - Light tracking, perma death… The combat system pits you against a host of diabolical monsters.
But remember this is a ...
Please note minis come unpainted.
The USA, European Union, Canada, Australia, and UK will be “Shipping Friendly”. Backers from these countries will not pay import taxes.
Shipping is not charged as part of this Kickstarter campaign but is instead done so on the pledge manager after the campaign ends. The shipping price you will pay is based on the weight of your pledge and the country to which it is to be shipped.
The above is a list of rough estimates for shipping. These estimates are based on the costs for our previous campaigns and an estimated final weight of the Core pledge at 5kg. Keep in mind that adding optional buys or additional pledge levels will raise the weight of your pledge and may also then raise the final shipping price.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
General

This is our tenth Kickstarter and we’ve learned a lot from our previous nine. Producing thousands of products and coordinating their delivery to homes across the planet is a complex business, and there are many things which could go wrong. This is why we build in as much time for the unforeseen as possible. We want to ensure that we have the space to deal with any unexpected setbacks and still get your game to you before the estimated delivery date.

To give you a frame of reference for exactly when you will get your game, Mythic Battles: Pantheon, Time of Legends: Joan of Arc season 1 and Reichbusters: Projekt Vril have been delivered. Super Fantasy Brawl is going to complete fulfillment by the end of the month. Solomon Kane, a big scope project, is at the printer and will be delivered in two waves. In specific wave 1 is in mass production now and the wave 2 moulds are also now being produced. Time of Legends: Joan of Arc season 1.5 is on track and the first elements will be soon sent to production. Enchanters: East Quest has been printed and is going to ship this month. Steamwatchers is on track and will go to production soon, to make the March fulfilment. HEL: The Last Saga is currently in development.

For all our games, we communicate with our backers with regular updates on Kickstarter and on Gamefound (for our late pledgers) You can also find us on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and Discord, learn our news and project updates through our weekly Newscast and ask all your questions in our Q&A with Leo on YouTube every Wednesday evening.

Please note that the components, component counts, quality and rules, are all work in progress and subject to change.

Delivery

Our experience in our previous KS has shown us that there can be variances in terms of timing and remaining in schedule when it comes to anything produced in China, such as:
Production delays
Shipping delays
Customs delays
At the same time there are also the unpredictable factors; recently it was the Coronavirus outbreak, but there can be others such as weather conditions, strikes and others.
The estimated delivery date for this project is October 2021, but please bear in mind this is only an estimate. Also, due to the logistics of international shipping, backers in different regions of the world may receive their rewards sooner than others.

Shipping

By pledging to this project, you acknowledge that the final look, materials, and content of the rewards (and the project) are subject to change and may differ substantially from what is presented in this Kickstarter project.
If you do not finalise your pledge and pay for shipping by the closing date of the pledge manager, you agree that we have fulfilled our obligations to you in full for payment or donations received. However, we may, at our discretion, refund or ship your pledge if you contact us and confirm your pledge after the pledge manager has closed.
If you confirm your pledge by the closing date of the pledge manager, you agree that our responsibility to you is to ship your order as entered into our pledge manager system, that title and risk passes to you upon delivery to a common carrier for such shipment, and that outside of countries specifically listed as being “friendly” (above) you are responsible for import duties or any other duties that may be payable to the relevant tax authorities, providing correct address information and ensuring this address is deliverable by normal methods. We regret we are unable to ship to PO Boxes or APO addresses.
All backers that have selected “No Reward” on Kickstarter, that wish to receive a reward for this campaign, must make sure to confirm their order by the Pledge Manager Deadline. We will announce the date for this once the Pledge Manager becomes live. All “No Reward” pledges will be treated as donations once the Pledge Manager Deadline has passed.

KSE

As KSE, or Kickstarter Exclusives, are marked the products that will not be available to retail. Mythic Games retains the right to continue to sell those in the Pledge Manager, the Mythic Games website, as well as conventions.

Refunds

We have a no-questions-asked refund policy.
All pledges can be refunded in full up to 14 days after the end of the Kickstarter campaign. In addition, if any part of your order cannot be delivered, then we will reimburse you the full cost of this component regardless of the date.
If you apply for a refund more than 14 days after the end of the Kickstarter then we will only be able to refund 85% of it. The difference is the amount of the unrecoverable fees paid to process your order.
Once we have started to process and pack your order, refunds will no longer be available.
Refunds within the first 14 days are reversed via Stripe to the credit card you used to pledge originally. Any refunds requested after the 14 day period may be processed via PayPal or reversed via Stripe or your credit card. This project is being funded in USD and any refunds processed will also be in USD.
If these terms are not acceptable to you, then we suggest that you do not participate in this crowdfunding campaign. Thank you for your understanding.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
It is a time of blood, of ritual, of war. Gods walk among the tribes, each hungering for the devotion that gives them form. Though the gods are many, only one will endure the ages above all others.
Mezo is an innovative game of area control for  2-4 players inspired by Mayan mythology. Players control a powerful god and a tribe of followers. These tribes will clash for dominance, build step pyramids, and make sacrifices all in the name of their god. 
The first big box game from Small Box Games designer John Clowdus (Omen, Hemloch, Neolithic), Mezo redefines area control and conflict-driven game play. The game features massive god miniatures, each with vastly asymmetrical  strategies, as well as numerous paths for players to achieve victory! 
This campaign also proudly offers the TRIBE pledge level: a non-miniatures edition of Mezo that includes all stretch goals! Plastic components are replaced with wooden components and cardboard standees.
The CHIEFTAIN PLEDGE is the core experience featured in our playthroughs with the Dice Tower and Man Vs. Meeple. It contains beautiful unit miniatures for 4 tribes (3 sculpts per tribe), as well as 4 massive Mayan gods! With all gods unlocked, this pledge level offers 91 possible game play combinations of gods from 2-4 players! Estimated retail value of $90--not including Souls for Xibalba content.
The DEVOTED PLEDGE is the ultimate experience for Mezo. It expands the game to five players with an all new tribe (3 more sculpts), as well as 5 more massive Mayan gods that further explore the game with all new strategies. It also includes more Altars and Wrathful tiles for even more game variability! With all gods unlocked, this pledge level offers 1,573 possible game play combinations of gods from 2-5 players! Estimated retail value of $140--not including Souls for Xibalba content.
The TRIBE PLEDGE offers the same game play experience as the DEVOTED PLEDGE level, only without the plastic unit and god miniatures. Instead, units are replaced with wooden components while the gods are massive punchboard standees! All other components are exactly the same as the DEVOTED PLEDGE. It is important to note that any plastic stretch goals that are unlocked are not included with this pledge level. Instead, miniatures like gods will be punch board standees. With all gods unlocked, this pledge level offers 1,573 possible game play combinations of gods from 2-5 players! This will only be available in small quantities after the campaign directly from Kolossal. This edition of Mezo will not be available in retail.
Each of the tribes has three unique sculpts: champion, shaman, and warrior. The Piranha tribe is included with the Devoted pledge. The tribe shown in our video content and graphics are the Jaguar tribe. We will share these other sculpts during the campaign.
The pyramid add-on is perfect for those that wish to elevate the game's already impressive table presence even further! Standees are also available for those that pledge at the CHIEFTAIN or DEVOTED levels.
Group pledges must be manually entered through the DEVOTED pledge. Mutiply shipping costs times the amount of copies you would like. All group pledges must be in a multiple of three.
For more insight into what makes Mezo such an innovative game, we invite you to watch the comprehensive videos below. This section also includes a summary of game steps about the heart of the game: the Conflict Step.
A game of Mezo plays out over three ages with the core of each age being defined by the Conflict Phase. At the start of the phase the top conflict tile will be revealed showing which region the conflict will occur.
Each player will then draw the top three cards from their god's unique action deck, select one to play during the conflict and return the remaining cards to the top of their action deck. Players will then simultaneously reveal their action card for the conflict.
In turn order, one at a time players will perform one of the available actions from their chosen action card until all players have performed two of their three available actions in an attempt to win one or more of the conflict rewards.
After each player has had the opportunity to perform their actions the conflict is over and players determine how the spoils will be divided.
First, the player with the most strength in the conflict receives the altar bonus for that region.
Second, the player with the most Shamans will place one of their Shaman minis from the conflict onto the Immortal Calendar gaining an immediate powerful effect in addition to securing VP during End of Age scoring.
Third, the player with the most Warriors will place one of their Warrior minis from the conflict onto the Heroic Codex gaining an immediate powerful effect in addition to securing VP during End of Age scoring.
After all conflicts in an age have been resolved, the age ends. At the end of the third age, the most powerful god rises above all others! 
For more detailed information on how to play Mezo, please peruse our rules draft here and let us know if you have any questions in the comments section of our campaign or on our BGG page here! 
 Mezo is the eighth campaign from Kolossal Games. While Kolossal is new to the industry, we hit the ground running, armed with the knowledge of industry best practices, experienced partners, and wonderful games. Our first game Western Legends  is in the process of fulfillment. We believe in open and honest communication and will share all info as we receive it with our backers. 
This is the first big box game by prolific designer John Clowdus. John has designed dozens of successful games over the last eight year through his own brand Small Box Games (Omen, Hemloch, Neolithic). Mezo is no exception to the quality and level of innovation he brings to everything he touches.
 Kolossal does not sell to online discounters. Backers will receive the game at a lower cost (even after shipping rates) and before the retail release of the game. Tribe pledge backers save $40 before shipping. Chieftain pledge backers save $50 before shipping. Devoted pledge backers receive $55 before shipping. The pyramid add-on has $5 savings now as well. Further, direct sales via the Kolossal website will only be to US customers.
This campaign features a simplified production level of the game without miniatures for those that want to back Mezo at a more affordable level.
Our team is led and supported by industry and marketing experts. We have a machine that works, fueled by amazing games that are designed, developed, and illustrated by incredibly talented people. The game is easy to learn while providing interesting, diverse, and tense game play each game, combining familiar mechanisms in a unique, new way.  
The game contains incredible illustrations, graphic design, and miniature designs from talented illustrator Daryl Toh. 
We are committed to begin fulfillment to backers of this game before it is made available in retail. Components and materials for the game are in the final stages of completion upon launch. All files will be uploaded to our manufacturing partner within one week of the campaign's ending. This ensures timely delivery to our backers. 
By backing at ANY pledge level through our campaign, you will receive, at no extra cost, the Souls for Xibalba.  This expansion will be comprised of stretch goals unlocked throughout the campaign and will only be available directly through Kolossal (at a cost) after the campaign. We have many exciting and interactive goals planned for those who are backers of Kolossal's eighth official release! 
Kickstarter is the world's largest funding platform for creative projects. Every month, tens of thousands of people pledge millions of dollars to creative projects in dozens of categories.
A person who supports a project is called a "backer." The process of giving money to this project is called a "pledge."
In return for your pledge, we (the creators of the campaign) are able to offer "rewards," depending on the amount you pledge. For example, if you pledge $80 to help back the project, we'll offer you a copy of the game along with any stretch goals we achieve as soon as it is manufactured.
You can become a backer in just three easy steps:
 Step 1: Read through the pledge levels and rewards we're offering in the right sidebar of this page.
   Step 2: Click the large, green "BACK THIS PROJECT" button to the right of the trailer video at the top of this page.
   Step 3: Enter your pledge amount, and complete the steps for filling in your information. This process takes just a few seconds! That's it! It's really that simple! Thank you for backing!
Once you've backed this project, we encourage you to share this page on social media platforms, such as Facebook and Twitter, and share with your friends and family. Also, be sure to like Kolossal Games on Facebook and follow us on Twitter for real-time updates about this project, and find us on Instagram and BoardGameGeek for even more!
Please click on your desired reward level to see the shipping cost for your region. Every backer is important to us, regardless of location, but the reality is that shipping is very expensive and is a cost we all need to share. To offset this, while remaining fiscally responsible, we have included a small discount on ALL shipping, but no shipping is free.
This campaign includes Customs-Friendly delivery to the US, Canada, the UK, and the EU. Customs-Friendly means, if you live in any of these regions and have any additional charges for receiving your package, simply email kickstarter@kolossalgames.com a copy of your customs receipt and we will reimburse you via PayPal. Note: If your country is not in one of the above-mentioned regions, we cannot guarantee customs friendly shipping in these areas. (For example, Norway & Switzerland are not in the European Union.)
Be aware that all pledges confirmed after the pledge manager deadline may be shipped at a later date. 
Due to the unpredictable customs practice in Brazil, we'll not cover any duty charges or other fees occurred. If the backer refuses to pay the charges or fees and the game is returned to us the backer will not be reimbursed for their order.
The table below gives you a general timeline of what to expect once the campaign ends. Please keep in mind these are just estimates, and the timeline may vary due to circumstances.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Risks and challenges
Our team has years of experience with publishing games and an impeccable track record of successfully delivering previous Kickstarter projects to thousands of supporters in a timely fashion--if not sooner. Our commitment to building a strong, supportive community around Kolossal Games will enable us to also deliver this project on time and with the highest quality possible. That said, there are always complexities and considerations in a project of this scope that may cause delays. There are many steps in the process of manufacturing and fulfilling a game, many of which involve partnerships. Through careful and thorough planning, common mistakes can be avoided. However, possible delays can occur from circumstances beyond our immediate control. If such an issue is encountered, our team will adapt and no corners will be cut to course correct as needed. Our greatest obstacle is simply the funding capital to manufacture such an ambitious product. Your contribution makes this a reality!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

support.title: TRIBE PLEDGE
support.descp:
The TRIBE PLEDGE offers the same game play experience as the DEVOTED PLEDGE level, only without the plastic unit and god miniatures. Instead, units are replaced with wooden components while the gods are massive punchboard standees! This pledge level also includes all stretch goals that will comprise the Souls for Xibalba direct exclusive expansion.
INCLUDES:
All Stretch Goals.
Wooden components and standees replace all plastic miniatures.

support.title: CHIEFTAIN
support.descp:
This pledge level is the core experience for 2-4 players shown on Dice Tower and Man vs. Meeple. This pledge level also includes all stretch goals that will comprise the Souls for Xibalba direct exclusive expansion.
INCLUDES:
All Stretch Goals.
Core experience: 4 gods, 2-4 players.

support.title: DEVOTED
support.descp:
This is the ultimate Mezo experience which expands the game from 2-5 players. It includes 5 additional massive Mayan god miniatures and all of their components, as well as more altars and Wrathful tiles. This is the English language version of the game. This pledge level also includes all stretch goals that will comprise the Souls for Xibalba direct exclusive expansion.
INCLUDES:
All Stretch Goals.
Ultimate experience: 9 gods, 2-5 players.

support.title: DEVOTED: FRENCH LANGUAGE EDITION
support.descp:

It includes 5 additional massive Mayan god miniatures and all of their components, as well as more altars and Wrathful tiles. This pledge level also includes all stretch goals that will comprise the Souls for Xibalba direct exclusive expansion.
A minimum of 200 backers is required for this language edition to be printed. Please check FAQ for more details.
INCLUDES:
All Stretch Goals.
Ultimate experience: 9 gods, 2-5 players.

support.title: To The Barricades!
support.descp:
The new content for this Kickstarter for backers who already own Thunderstone Quest.
Requires Thunderstone Quest base game (Champion or Adventurer Reward from the 1st Kickstarter).
DOES NOT INCLUDE Shipping & Handling (See Shipping section for more details)
INCLUDES:
Barricades Mode: all components required for Solo & CoOp play
Quest 6: What Lies Beneath (approx. 245 cards + dungeon tiles)
Epic Thunderstone Support for Quest 6 and Stretch Goals
Stretch Goals for this Campaign

support.title: Champion
support.descp:
This Reward is identical to the Champion Reward from the 1st Thunderstone Quest Kickstarter.
DOES NOT INCLUDE Barricades Mode or Quest 6: What Lies Beneath.
DOES NOT INCLUDE Stretch Goals
DOES NOT INCLUDE Shipping & Handling (See Shipping section for more details)
INCLUDES:
All base game components
Quest 1: A Mirror in the Dark
Quest 2: Total Eclipse of the Sun (KSE)
Quest 3: Risen from the Mire
Quest 4: At the Foundations of the World
Quest 5: Ripples in Time
All Kickstarter Exclusive content Thunderstone Quest 1st KS

support.title: Champion + Barricades!
support.descp:
The Champion Reward and To The Barricades! Reward.
DOES NOT INCLUDE Shipping & Handling (See Shipping section for more details)
INCLUDES:
Champion Reward (identical to Champion Reward from 1st KS)
To the Barricades! Reward identical to that reward in this KS

support.title: Champion+Barricades Expedited (US ONLY)
support.descp:
The Champion Reward and To The Barricades! Reward.
We have 1,000 units of Champion in our US warehouse. US backers can select this option and we will expedite delivery of the Champion portion of their reward before the rest of the content is ready.
Due to customs, costs, and complexity concerns we can only make this offer available for shipments inside the United States.
There is no charge for the Champion shipment; backers of this Reward will pay shipping & handling for the rest of the content via the Pledge Manager.
INCLUDES:
Champion Reward (identical to Champion Reward from 1st KS)
To the Barricades! Reward identical to that reward in this KS

support.title: Your Inventory is Full!
support.descp:
Everything in this Kickstarter for New Backers!
IF YOU ARE AN EXPEDITED BACKER you will be able to upgrade to this option in the Pledge Manager. DO NOT CANCEL YOUR CURRENT REWARD or you will lose your Expedited status. Please see the campaign page for more information.
DOES NOT INCLUDE Shipping & Handling (See Shipping section for more details)
INCLUDES:
Champion Reward (identical to Champion Reward from 1st KS)
To the Barricades! Reward identical to that reward in this KS
6 Packs of Premium Sleeves (3,000 Sleeves)
Epic Thunderstone Add-On for Champion
Neoprene Playmat
